name: Tournament of Armistice: Preliminaries
description:
Select your champion, and enter the Tournament of Armistice: Preliminaries; a one-on-one fighting game featuring RPG mechanics and abilities


Tournament of Armistice: Preliminaries is currently under development, with Early Access available now



EARLY ACCESS FEATURES


Four playable characters
Four Champions are available; the Warrior, the Mage, the Rogue, and the Ranger, each with their unique style of gameplay mechanics and abilities



Four AI difficulty levels
From beginner to veteran, each difficulty is suited to different skill levels



Training and Tutorials
Learn abilities and mechanics of each character in a training environment



Online Player vs Player (PvP)
Challenge your friends online!
